00037 /*  Internal class, which allows to iterate through all theme views.
00038     The class should not be used by the MMI in a direct manner, as the
00039     interface might get changed in future releases. */
00040 class ThemeViewIterator {
00041     public:
00042         ThemeViewIterator(Theme* theme);
00043         virtual ~ThemeViewIterator();
00044         void Begin();
00045         BOOLEAN Next();
00046         View* GetView() const;
00047 
00048     private:
00049         INT m_index;
00050         View* m_view;
00051         Theme* m_theme;
00052 };
